item.title: Texas lawmaker attempts to stall GOP redistricting plan with all-nighter
item.description: State Sen. Carol Alvarado, a Houston lawyer, Democrat and veteran of stalling, prepares for another run at holding up business in Texas.

item.title: Texas state Senate moves toward passing Trump-backed election map
item.description: The GOP-controlled chamber cleared for final approval by Friday evening a map to create five new U.S. House districts in Texas that favor Republicans....

item.title: IRS plans to bring back workers it pushed out but now needs
item.description: Thousands of staffers left the tax agency, and now managers have found vacancies in critical areas.

item.title: Justice Department sends House committee first batch of Epstein files
item.description: The House Oversight Committee issued a subpoena this month for information from the investigation into sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Trump seeks funding to clean up D.C. in latest effort to control city
item.description: The longtime real estate developer has falsely claimed he has solved the cityâ€™s crime problems. Now he seeks to transform Washington into a place remi...
